subject: Eugene PD MOU for Flock
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi Jaime,

I'd like to introduce you to Detective Derek DeWitt from Eugene PD. I've been working with him on the Flock project via Oregon ORC grant. In the meantime, they'd like to access Flock (particularly Lowes -- I set him up with Emma to help with Lowes specifically). 

Can you please assist Detective DeWitt with Flock training and getting set up with a log in? Thank you! 
	
 
Caroline Fraher
Territory Sales Manager



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 

 https://www.facebook.com/flocksafety 

 https://www.youtube.com/c/FlockSafety 

 <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfm1/108062/26/trans.png>  310-844-3659 call/text <tel:310-844-3659call/text>    <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfw4/108062/26/trans.png>  flocksafety.com 

 <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfcustom/108062/26/trans.png>  caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com 

	
 

	
 https://www.wavy.com/news/local-news/james-city-county/jcc-police-investigate-road-rage-incident-as-victims-recover/ 

	
 	 
 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/LqvQN3KRDRjb.png>
